byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: MF Global, the reeling brokerage firm run by Jon S. Corzine, the former New Jersey governor, is seeking a buyer before the markets reopen on Monday.
snippet: MF Global, the reeling brokerage firm run by Jon S. Corzine, the former New Jersey governor, is seeking a buyer before the markets reopen on Monday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies

headline.main: MF Global Put Up for Sale, This Weekend Only
